channel.description: Recent content in no on alexchiri.com

item.title: Do you say no?
item.description: Cover picture from growingleaders.com We all want to help other people, we like to be problem solvers, we want to be in the spotlight, no seems like a barrier To start with a well-known geek joke[1], “there are 10 types of people in the world”, those who can say no and those who can not. No(!), I’m actually talking about those situations where you know you should say no, but you don’t.
